document.full_text: myanmar pro-democracy leader aung san suu kyi urged china's communist leaders on monday to be more open and tolerant amidst a heavy clampdown on dissidents and government critics in recent months.
document.title: myanmar's suu kyi calls for china openness amid clampdown
lines_and_colors: myanmar pro-democracy leader aung san suu kyi urged china's communist leaders on monday to be more open and tolerant amidst a heavy clampdown on dissidents and government critics in recent months.
